description: Creates a service account for the workspace. A service account can be used to call Grafana HTTP APIs, and run automated workloads. After creating the service account with the correct GrafanaRole for your use case, use CreateWorkspaceServiceAccountToken to create a token that can be used to authenticate and authorize Grafana HTTP API calls. You can only create service accounts for workspaces that are compatible with Grafana version 9 and above.

parameters.name: grafanaRole
parameters.description: The permission level to use for this service account.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: A name for the service account. The name must be unique within the workspace, as it determines the ID associated with the service account.

parameters.name: workspaceId
parameters.description: The ID of the workspace within which to create the service account.

nested_items.name: grafanaRole
nested_items.description: The permission level given to the service account.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the service account.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the service account.

nested_items.name: workspaceId
nested_items.description: The workspace with which the service account is associated.
